name: Searching (NicoNeko)
description:
A lost spirit searching for his true home.

Music/designer/programmer/artist: NicoNeko

Limit: No text

===========================================

Hi there! 

I'm a college student and this is the product of my first game jam! ヽ(＊>∇<)ﾉ

As you can tell, I might've slightly ran out of time... ¯\_▒ – ﹏ – ▒_/¯

But despite all that, have fun helping out little guy find his home!

-NicoNeko
